It’s been a long road, but after 50 years #SocialSecurity disability will reflect a 21st century economy. Thanks @realDonaldTrump for pushing these much-needed changes over the finish line.

In 2015, I offered an amendment to the Budget Act that would improve the process & prevent those from receiving #SocialSecurity disability who aren't disabled. Part of that amendment again included updating the grid.

We have been fighting for updates for years. In 2014, I requested that the Acting Commissioner make 11 reforms to #SocialSecurity disability that they had agency authority to change and didn’t need congressional approval for. One of those was updating the grid.
The grid hasn’t been updated since 1978. Because of that, the eligibility criteria doesn’t include modern day jobs that use 21st century technologies.

Under the current system, part of #SocialSecurity disability eligibility is defined by an employment grid, which is a list of every job in the marketplace. It is used with a decision-making tool that factors things like age, education, & work experience.

Big news for the future of @SocialSecurity disability program. The eligibility criteria hasn't been meaningfully updated since 1978, leaving many on disability even though there are opportunities for those who want to work. https://twitter.com/WSJPolitics/status/1215848446806175745 …

Unrelated to humanitarian issues, translation. Let’s put it off until later.

On May 1, DHS & HHS sent another letter to say they are in a crisis moment. May 17, again they are at a critical moment.
But still nothing has happened. These children are not pawns.

These children are currently being used as pawns to try to hurt the Trump Administration, & my Democratic colleagues are trying to identify children that are not getting care, while at the same time slowing down the process of providing humanitarian aid.

Congress didn’t do anything. I’ve had personal convos w/Dems & GOP Members-at what point do we admit the obvious statement that Obama & Trump Admins made? If we don’t resolve Flores settlement this will not get better b/c traffickers will cont to move children across border.
